description.value:
School evocation; Level cleric/oracle 3, medium 2, occultist 3, psychic 3, shaman 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner 3, unchained Summoner 3, witch 3;

Casting Time 1 minute
Components V, S, M (see text)

Range 200 miles
Targets up to 20 entities of 12 HD or fewer
Duration instantaneous
Saving Throw none; Spell Resistance no

Description

This spell functions like contact entity I, except that you can contact creatures from the contact entity II list, and as noted above.

target.value: up to 20 entities of 12 HD or fewer
